typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 split(ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Rating > 7, Rating < 7)
